caption: Figure 1: Levels of speech understanding using LLMs.
description: The figure illustrates a five-level roadmap for speech understanding using LLMs, ranging from basic speech recognition to advanced superhuman models.

caption: Figure 2: Cascade and End-to-end paradigms.
